metadata.name: Glim
metadata.description:
Portal 1: Glim 
Nov, 2020
Rabat, Morocco

PORTALS is an everlasting photo series where each photo 
is the embodiment of a challenge thrown at me through a phase 
in my life. It serves as a liberating outlook on my trials and tribulations: each portal is a documentation of my state of mind and ambushes. 
To step foot into each of them, I must challenge myself and question 
all my predispositions in order to understand myself, my shortcomings and how I can deal with them.

This project is not only a quest for me to find my true self, but also a reminder that hardships are ordinary occurrences and they’re of fleeting nature  — a stepping stone to build resilience and make people less apprehensive about the future. Losing it at each impasse that comes my way is consequently futile. 

To symbolize my path to self discovery, enlightenment and inner peace, I try to capture sceneries with intense beacons of light.
